item.title: Taylor Swift Confirmed to Make Guest Appearance on Travis Kelce’s ‘New Heights’ Podcast
item.description: The NFL star hosts the podcast with his brother, Jason Kelce.

item.title: Craig Mazin, John August to Release ‘Scriptnotes’ Book Based on Hit Podcast (Exclusive)
item.description: For the book, August and Mazin drew on hours of Scriptnotes conversations, as well as their own storied careers, to help readers begin, refine and sell their own scripts.

item.title: Is Silicon Valley Losing Its Influence on DC?
item.description: This episode of Uncanny Valley covers black holes, woke AI, and the relationship between Silicon Valley billionaires and the Trump Administration.

item.title: Malcolm-Jamal Warner’s Podcast to Honor Him With Virtual Event After Death
item.description: The team behind the late ‘Cosby Show’ alum’s ‘Not All Hood’ program will celebrate his legacy Friday night.

item.title: Heidi Montag and Spencer Pratt Return to Podcasting With Launch of ‘The Fame Game’
item.description: Produced by Studio71, the podcast series hosted by the longtime couple debuts Thursday, July 24.

item.title: Just For Laughs: Tig Notaro, Fortune Feimster, Mae Martin to Receive Best Podcast Award
item.description: The trio of comedians will be honored at the Montreal comedy festival’s awards show on Friday.
